cs101a23_lq01_a_ps5.problem_statement: Write a program that takes two positive integers A and B as input, passes them to a function that computes the LCM, and finally prints the result in the main function.

Criterion 5.description: is any standard library used to calculate LCM?

ratings.B: if standard library LCM is  used
ratings.A: if standard library LCM function is not used

Criterion 4.description: is LCM function returning value to main function

ratings.B: if LCM function is not returning value correctly
ratings.A: if LCM is returning value correctly to main function

ratings.B: if least common factor is not calculated directly
ratings.A: if the least common factor is correctly calculated by using loop and conditional execution
